title: Australia’s New Digital Assets Bill Seeks to Prevent Past Crypto Failures
contentSnippet: The Australian government introduced digital assets legislation to modernize its financial system and safeguard consumers.

title: Ethereum raises block gas limit to 60M as ecosystem throughput hits new records ahead of Fusaka upgrade
contentSnippet: Ethereum increased its block gas limit to 60 million after securing majority validator support days before the Fusaka upgrade.

title: ‘A rainy island with a hostile tax system is a hard sell’: Crypto industry reacts to UK Chancellor’s budget statement
contentSnippet: Crypto industry figures welcomed pro-entrepreneur measures but warned that wider tax and regulatory pressures could hurt UK competitiveness.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Leads Broad Recovery as Traders Eye Possible Santa Rally
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and ether surged following Wednesday's tech-led equities rebound, while derivatives flows signal growing optimism for a year-end push.

title: 'Improving Risk Sentiment' Driving Bitcoin's $90K Retest: QCP
contentSnippet: Analysts remain cautiously optimistic, with Bitcoin reclaiming $90K as the chances of a December rate cut hit 85%.

title: Ark Invest Buys $16.5M of Coinbase Stock, Largest Purchase Since Aug. 1
contentSnippet: COIN closed at $264.97, 4.27% higher on the day, accompanying a relative recovery in the crypto market, which saw bitcoin gain over 3.3% to reclaim $90,000.

title: Ripple’s RLUSD Stablecoin Wins Key Regulatory Green Light in UAE
contentSnippet: The designation means licensed firms can use the dollar-pegged token for regulated activities, placing it into a small group of tokens permitted by the ADGM’s ring-fenced financial system.

title: Philippine Digital Asset Exchange Eyes $60B Tokenization Opportunity With Project Bayani
contentSnippet: The Philippines has a $60 billion opportunity in asset tokenization, potentially transforming its capital markets by 2030.

title: Australia moves to fold crypto platforms into financial licensing regime
contentSnippet: Australia's Treasury submitted a new bill to parliament on Wednesday, seeking to require financial licenses for certain crypto platforms.

title: Ark Invest loads up on Coinbase as Cathie Wood predicts ‘real break’ in inflation
contentSnippet: Cathie Wood forecasted that the current liquidity squeeze will reverse in the near term, and said inflation may end next year.

title: Bitcoin Rebounds Past $91K as XRP ETFs Continue to Grab Attention
contentSnippet: Total XRP ETF assets crossed $628 million, absorbing nearly 80 million tokens in 24 hours, making for a stronger initial response than Solana’s ETF debut earlier this year.

title: South Korea’s Upbit Reports $36 Million Loss in Solana Hot-Wallet Breach
contentSnippet: South Korea’s largest crypto exchange halted services and shifted assets to cold storage after detecting unauthorized withdrawals.

title: DOGE Builds Bullish Structure With Higher Lows as ETFs Fail to Wow
contentSnippet: Technical analysis shows DOGE breaking above resistance with a significant volume surge, indicating bullish momentum.

title: XRP Prints V-Shaped Recovery as ETF Catalysts Align With Technicals
contentSnippet: Technical indicators suggest strong momentum, with XRP trading in an ascending broadening wedge and targeting further gains if it remains above key support levels.

title: Australia Moves to Regulate Crypto Platforms Under New Consumer-Protection Law
contentSnippet: The new framework subjects exchanges and custody providers to financial services laws with ASIC as the primary regulator.

title: Nasdaq ISE Seeks to Quadruple Trading Limits on BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Options
contentSnippet: The move marks a shift that would bring Bitcoin derivatives in line with major equities and deepen institutional access to the market.

title: Naver and Upbit to pour $7 billion into AI, blockchain following mega-merger: reports
contentSnippet: Naver and Upbit plan to build a financial infrastructure that builds on top of AI and blockchain, according to multiple local reports.

title: Upbit suffers $37 million hack on Solana assets, halts withdrawals
contentSnippet: Upbit identified 540 billion won worth of abnormal withdrawal of various assets on the Solana network from the platform.

title: Korea's Upbit Suspends Deposit And Withdrawal Service After $37M in Abnormal Activity in Solana Tokens
contentSnippet: Upbit has suspended digital asset withdrawals after detecting irregular activity involving Solana network tokens.

title: Bitcoin rebounds above $91,000 as December rate cut odds rise
contentSnippet: Analysts said traders remain focused on macro signals, particularly on growing expectations for a December Fed rate cut.

title: Bitcoin's Ascent May Hit a Wall Around Mid-$90K: Trading Firm
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has surged past the $90,000 mark, buoyed by rising expectations of a December Federal Reserve rate cut.

title: SpaceX transfers $105 million in bitcoin to unmarked wallets: Arkham
contentSnippet: Some have previously suggested that SpaceX was simply transferring bitcoin in an effort to consolidate its holdings.

title: Global Exchanges Urge SEC to Curb Broad Crypto Exemptions, Warn on Tokenized Stock Risks
contentSnippet: The SEC is being warned not to let crypto firms bypass investor protection rules as it considers exemptive relief for tokenized stocks.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Why Is Bitcoin Down? Blame Trump, Says Economist Paul Krugman
contentSnippet: Bitcoin critic Krugman says it's no coincidence that BTC is down, just as crypto-friendly President Trump stumbles in the polls.

title: CryptoQuant says big bitcoin holders increased deposits to exchanges as prices fell
contentSnippet: The firm noted that exchange activity in ETH and altcoins also remained elevated, putting further downward pressure on prices.

title: Securitize wins EU approval to operate tokenized trading and settlement system, selects Avalanche
contentSnippet: The approval lets Securitize operate at the market-infrastructure layer, going beyond its earlier brokerage and transfer-agent permissions.

title: S&P Downgrades Tether's USDT Stability to 'Weak' Due to Bitcoin Backing Concerns
contentSnippet: S&P Global Ratings has downgraded Tether's USDT, warning that the industry-leading stablecoin could suffer if Bitcoin's price crashes. Tether disagrees.

title: Bitcoin Reclaims $90K Ahead of Thanksgiving as Ethereum, XRP Bounce Back
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has broken above $90,000 per coin again, nearly a week after it dipped to a seven-month low of about $81,000.

title: South Korea's Top Crypto Exchange to Be Absorbed By Tech Giant in $10.3 Billion Deal
contentSnippet: The pending merger, between Upbit owner Dunamu and payments giant Naver, is reportedly focused on the booming stablecoin sector.

title: Robinhood Stock Rises Following Deal That Could Boost Its Prediction Market Push
contentSnippet: Trading app Robinhood may be looking to launch its own prediction market platform, analysts say, following a newly announced acquisition.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.
